content:
Customer Endpoints
------------------

### Submit Inquiry

* Endpoint path: /api/inquiries/
* Endpoint method: POST
* Request shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "customer_name": "string",
    "customer_phone": "string",
    "service_id": "integer"
}
```
* Response: New inquiry information
* Response shape (JSON):
```json
{
    "id": "integer",
    "customer_name": "string",
    "customer_phone": "string",
    "service_id": "integer"
}
```
